attributes.action: If action is to be taken over Syria, Do it  wearing UN  uniforms
attributes.additional_details:
If  action is to be taken to save loss of innocent lives  in Syria,  please  only  take that action  with the full backing of the United Nations (UN).

It should be an International Peace Keeping Force in UN badged vehicles  and any military forces wearing the Blue Berets  and Blue helmets  of the UN.

I further suggest  that the Commander in Chief  on the ground  of such a force  should be a Russian officer.
